list_definition.definition: (knowledge, skill or wisdom gained through) practice in some activity, or the doing of something

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Learn by experience – don’t make the same mistake again

list_definition.definition: an event that affects or involves a person etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The earthquake was a terrible experience.

list_definition.definition: to have experience of; to feel

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I have never before experienced such rudeness!
